en_us: Break apart gold and iron tools and weapons for materials. Attach this to a mob farm to finally make use of those extra armour sets!
Disassmeblers can be crafted in Custom Crafters.\n\nDisassemblers can take apart metal armour, tools, and weapons and return ingots based on the item's durability.
A Disassembler can be crafted in a Custom Crafter:
Items placed inside a disassembler will be broken into its base ingots.\n\nThe return is based on the percent durability left on the item.
